verses.verse: אַ֣לְלַי <WH480> Woe לִ֗י כִּ֤י <WH3588> For הָיִ֙יתִי֙ <WH1961> I am כְּאָסְפֵּי־ <WH625> is me for I am as when they have gathered קַ֔יִץ <WH7019> the summer fruits כְּעֹלְלֹ֖ת <WH5955> as the grapegleanings בָּצִ֑יר <WH1210> of the vintage אֵין־ <WH369> There אֶשְׁכּ֣וֹל <WH811> [there is] no cluster לֶאֱכ֔וֹל <WH398> to eat בִּכּוּרָ֖ה <WH1063> the firstripe fruit אִוְּתָ֥ה <WH183> desired נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> my soul

אָבַ֤ד <WH6> [man] is perished חָסִיד֙ <WH2623> The good מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> out of the earth וְיָשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> and [there is] none upright בָּאָדָ֖ם <WH120> among men אָ֑יִן <WH369> and there כֻּלָּם֙ <WH3605> All לְדָמִ֣ים <WH1818> for blood יֶאֱרֹ֔בוּ <WH693> they all lie in wait אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man אֶת־ <WH853> אָחִ֖יהוּ <WH251> his brother יָצ֥וּדוּ <WH6679> they hunt חֵֽרֶם׃ <WH2764> with a net

עַל־ <WH5921> Concerning הָרַ֤ע <WH7451> That they may do evil כַּפַּ֙יִם֙ <WH3709> with both hands לְהֵיטִ֔יב <WH3190> earnestly הַשַּׂ֣ר <WH8269> the prince שֹׁאֵ֔ל <WH7592> asketh וְהַשֹּׁפֵ֖ט <WH8199> and the judge בַּשִּׁלּ֑וּם <WH7966> [asketh] for a reward וְהַגָּד֗וֹל <WH1419> and the great דֹּבֵ֨ר <WH1696> [man] he uttereth הַוַּ֥ת <WH1942> his mischievous נַפְשׁ֛וֹ <WH5315> desire ה֖וּא <WH1931> they וַֽיְעַבְּתֽוּהָ׃ <WH5686> so they wrap it up

טוֹבָ֣ם <WH2896> The best כְּחֵ֔דֶק <WH2312> of them [is] as a brier יָשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> the most upright מִמְּסוּכָ֑ה <WH4534> [is sharper] than a thorn hedge י֤וֹם <WH3117> the day מְצַפֶּ֙יךָ֙ <WH6822> of thy watchmen פְּקֻדָּתְךָ֣ <WH6486> [and] thy visitation בָ֔אָה <WH935> cometh עַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> Then תִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> will occur מְבוּכָתָֽם׃ <WH3998> now shall be their perplexity

אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּאֲמִ֣ינוּ <WH539> Trust בְרֵ֔עַ <WH7453> ye not in a friend אַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּבְטְח֖וּ <WH982> put ye not confidence בְּאַלּ֑וּף <WH441> in a guide מִשֹּׁכֶ֣בֶת <WH7901> from her that lieth חֵיקֶ֔ךָ <WH2436> in thy bosom שְׁמֹ֖ר <WH8104> keep פִּתְחֵי־ <WH6607> the doors פִֽיךָ׃ <WH6310> of thy mouth

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For בֵן֙ <WH1121> For the son מְנַבֵּ֣ל <WH5034> dishonoureth אָ֔ב <WH1> the father בַּ֚ת <WH1323> the daughter קָמָ֣ה <WH6965> riseth up בְאִמָּ֔הּ <WH517> against her mother כַּלָּ֖ה <WH3618> the daughter in law בַּחֲמֹתָ֑הּ <WH2545> against her mother in law אֹיְבֵ֥י <WH341> enemies אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> a man's אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> [are] the men בֵיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> of his own house

וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> I בַּיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֲצַפֶּ֔ה <WH6822> Therefore I will look אוֹחִ֖ילָה <WH3176> I will wait לֵאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> for the God יִשְׁעִ֑י <WH3468> of my salvation יִשְׁמָעֵ֖נִי <WH8085> will hear אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> my God

אַֽל־ <WH408> nay תִּשְׂמְחִ֤י <WH8056> glad אֹיַ֙בְתִּי֙ <WH341> not against me O mine enemy לִ֔י כִּ֥י <WH3588> Though נָפַ֖לְתִּי <WH5307> when I fall קָ֑מְתִּי <WH6965> I shall arise כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Though אֵשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> when I sit בַּחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> in darkness יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD א֥וֹר <WH216> [shall be] a light לִֽי׃ ס

זַ֤עַף <WH2197> the indignation יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֶשָּׂ֔א <WH5375> I will bear כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because חָטָ֖אתִי <WH2398> because I have sinned ל֑וֹ עַד֩ <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> he יָרִ֤יב <WH7378> against him until he plead רִיבִי֙ <WH7379> my cause וְעָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> and execute מִשְׁפָּטִ֔י <WH4941> judgment יוֹצִיאֵ֣נִי <WH3318> for me he will bring me forth לָא֔וֹר <WH216> to the light אֶרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> [and] I shall behold בְּצִדְקָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6666> his righteousness

וְתֵרֶ֤א <WH7200> shall see אֹיַ֙בְתִּי֙ <WH341> Then [she that is] mine enemy וּתְכַסֶּ֣הָ <WH3680> shall cover בוּשָׁ֔ה <WH955> [it] and shame הָאֹמְרָ֣ה <WH559> her which said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about אַיּ֖וֹ <WH346> where יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto me Where is the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יִךְ <WH430> angels עֵינַי֙ <WH5869> affliction תִּרְאֶ֣ינָּה <WH7200> shall behold בָּ֔הּ עַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> time תִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לְמִרְמָ֖ס <WH4823> her now shall she be trodden down כְּטִ֥יט <WH2916> as the mire חוּצֽוֹת׃ <WH2351> of the streets

י֖וֹם <WH3117> [In] the day לִבְנ֣וֹת <WH1129> are to be built גְּדֵרָ֑יִךְ <WH1447> that thy walls י֥וֹם <WH3117> [in] that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he יִרְחַק־ <WH7368> be far removed חֹֽק׃ <WH2706> shall the decree

י֥וֹם <WH3117> [In] that day הוּא֙ <WH1931> he וְעָדֶ֣יךָ <WH5704> they יָב֔וֹא <WH935> [also] he shall come לְמִנִּ֥י <WH4480> From אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> even to thee from Assyria וְעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> cities מָצ֑וֹר <WH4692> besieged וּלְמִנִּ֤י <WH4480> at מָצוֹר֙ <WH4693> and [from] the fortified וְעַד־ <WH5704> even נָהָ֔ר <WH5104> even to the river וְיָ֥ם <WH3220> and from sea מִיָּ֖ם <WH3220> to sea וְהַ֥ר <WH2022> and [from] mountain הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> to mountain

וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> will become הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> Notwithstanding the land לִשְׁמָמָ֖ה <WH8077> shall be desolate עַל־ <WH5921> because יֹֽשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <WH3427> because of them that dwell מִפְּרִ֖י <WH6529> therein for the fruit מַֽעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4611> of their doings ס

רְעֵ֧ה <WH7462> Feed עַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> thy people בְשִׁבְטֶ֗ךָ <WH7626> with thy rod צֹ֚אן <WH6629> the flock נַֽחֲלָתֶ֔ךָ <WH5159> of thine heritage שֹׁכְנִ֣י <WH7931> which dwell לְבָדָ֔ד <WH910> solitarily יַ֖עַר <WH3293> [in] the wood בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst כַּרְמֶ֑ל <WH3760> of Carmel יִרְע֥וּ <WH7462> let them feed בָשָׁ֛ן <WH1316> [in] Bashan וְגִלְעָ֖ד <WH1568> and Gilead כִּימֵ֥י <WH3117> as in the days עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> of old

כִּימֵ֥י <WH3117> According to the days צֵאתְךָ֖ <WH3318> of thy coming מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אַרְאֶ֖נּוּ <WH7200> will I shew נִפְלָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6381> unto him marvellous

יִרְא֤וּ <WH7200> shall see גוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> The nations וְיֵבֹ֔שׁוּ <WH954> and be confounded מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> of all גְּבֽוּרָתָ֑ם <WH1369> at all their might יָשִׂ֤ימוּ <WH7760> they shall lay יָד֙ <WH3027> [their] hand עַל־ <WH5921> on פֶּ֔ה <WH6310> upon [their] mouth אָזְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH241> their ears תֶּחֱרַֽשְׁנָה׃ <WH2790> shall be deaf

יְלַחֲכ֤וּ <WH3897> They shall lick עָפָר֙ <WH6083> the dust כַּנָּחָ֔שׁ <WH5175> like a serpent כְּזֹחֲלֵ֣י <WH2119> like worms אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth יִרְגְּז֖וּ <WH7264> they shall move מִמִּסְגְּרֹֽתֵיהֶ֑ם <WH4526> out of their holes אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> our God יִפְחָ֔דוּ <WH6342> they shall be afraid וְיִֽרְא֖וּ <WH3372> and shall fear מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH4480> before

מִי־ <WH4310> Who אֵ֣ל <WH410> Who [is] a God כָּמ֗וֹךָ <WH3644> like נֹשֵׂ֤א <WH5375> like unto thee that pardoneth עָוֹן֙ <WH5771> iniquity וְעֹבֵ֣ר <WH5674> and passeth by עַל־ <WH5921> over פֶּ֔שַׁע <WH6588> the transgression לִשְׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> of the remnant נַחֲלָת֑וֹ <WH5159> heritage לֹא־ <WH3808> not הֶחֱזִ֤יק <WH2388> aid לָעַד֙ <WH5703> for ever אַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> not his anger כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because חָפֵ֥ץ <WH2654> because he delighteth חֶ֖סֶד <WH2617> [in] mercy הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> He

יָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> He will turn again יְרַֽחֲמֵ֔נוּ <WH7355> he will have compassion יִכְבֹּ֖שׁ <WH3533> upon us he will subdue עֲוֹֽנֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH5771> our iniquities וְתַשְׁלִ֛יךְ <WH7993> and thou wilt cast בִּמְצֻל֥וֹת <WH4688> into the depths יָ֖ם <WH3220> of the sea כָּל־ <WH3605> all חַטֹּאותָֽם׃ <WH2403> all their sins

תִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> Thou wilt perform אֱמֶת֙ <WH571> the truth לְיַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> to Jacob חֶ֖סֶד <WH2617> [and] the mercy לְאַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> to Abraham אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Which נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתָּ <WH7650> which thou hast sworn לַאֲבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH1> unto our fathers מִ֥ימֵי <WH3117> from the days קֶֽדֶם׃ <WH6924> of old
